about:
Hello, I'm Alimur Razi, and I embarked on my career journey in 2018 as a software developer. Over the years, I have gained experience with various programming languages and frameworks, constantly keeping up with the latest technologies. My passion lies in JavaScript, and I've followed its evolution from jQuery to microservice development. I consider myself a diligent worker who tackles challenges with dedication and perseverance.


 In addition to my work, I am an avid book enthusiast, enjoying a wide range of literature, from 19th-century classic novels to contemporary thrillers. As the saying goes, "So many books, so little time."
